item.title: You Don't Need to Burn off Your Fingertips (and Other Biometric Authentication Myths)
item.description: 111 years ago almost to the day, a murder was committed which ultimately led to the first criminal trial to use fingerprints as evidence. We've all since watched enough crime shows to understand that fingerprints are unique personal biometric attributes and to date, no two people have ever been found
item.author: (https://www.facebook.com/troyahunt)
